verbs.description: DALLAS , Texas -- [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's message Friday at the National Rifle Association convention] [V: was] [ARG2: clear and welcomed] . Trump came equipped with reassurances and a commitment to protecting gun owners ' Second Amendment rights .
